caption: The photograph captures an agricultural scene where a person is operating an old tractor, pulling what appears to be a plow or some other farm equipment through a muddy field. The field shows signs of recent activity with distinctive tread marks and turned over soil, highlighted with patches of snow, suggesting it might be early spring or late fall. In the background, there's a vast flat landscape that extends to a water body and a low mountain range in the far distance under a cloudy sky. The setting suggests a chilly, damp environment typical of a transitional season in a rural area. The rough, uneven terrain and the purposeful movement of the tractor emphasize the hard work involved in preparing the land for planting or managing the field.
title: Disposal site for the approximately 1,200,000 gallons of liquid sludge from the nearby contaminated five acre pond.  A tractor pulling a disc is shown mixing the treated sludge with earth.  Epa personnel supervised cleanup and disposal operations.  Utah state university will monitor the disposal site under an agreement with epa
